#### Tender Description
Health Canada is seeking a Project Manager Level 3 Consultant to implement a new financial tool to improve departmental reporting capabilities and financial forecasting. The new application will replace the existing financial forecasting tool from WebFocus with a more efficient and effective system in support of departmental priorities. A timely and accurate financial forecasting and reporting system is critical for decision-making. This will be a coordinated effort with the Public Health Agency of Canada. The consultant will be required to work on the Management Reporting Solution (MRS)/Management Variance Reporting (MVR) Replacement Solution as required at Health Canada.
